type.name: LoggerOptions
type.prop: Use this middleware for every request.

type.name: LoggerConfig

prop.type: (str: string, args: [string, string, string, string, string, string, string]) => void
prop.name: transporter

type.prop: Param `str` is output string with ANSI Color, and you can get pure text with other modules like `strip-ansi`. Param `args` is a array by `[format, method, url, status, time, length]`.
